news.title: Pulp Share Video for New Song “Got to Have Love”: Watch
news.summary: The second single from More is a “slightly hysterical song that tries to talk about love as I see it now,” according to Jarvis Cocker

news.title: Kid Cudi Testifies in Diddy Trial
news.summary: Following testimonies from Cassie and Dawn Richard, the rapper took the stand on Thursday to discuss his car being blown up allegedly in retaliation for dating Diddy’s former partner

news.title: Watch Bad Bunny in the First Trailer for New Darren Aronofsky Movie Caught Stealing
news.summary: Bad Bunny plays a vengeful Puerto Rican gangster in the film, which also stars Austin Butler, Zoë Kravitz, Action Bronson, and more

news.title: Beastie Boys Settle Lawsuit Against Chili’s Owner Over “Sabotage” Ads
news.summary: The band’s label, Universal Music Group, also settled lawsuits accusing the restaurant chain of using its music without permission

news.title: Watch Wednesday Perform “Elderberry Wine” on Colbert
news.summary: The Asheville, North Carolina, indie-rock band made its television debut last night

news.title: Slikback Announces Debut Planet Mu Album, Shares New Song: Listen
news.summary: The Kenyan electronic music producer releases Attrition in July

news.title: Isabella Lovestory Announces New Album Vanity, Shares Video for New Song “Gorgeous”: Watch
news.summary: The Honduran experimental pop artist’s follow-up to 2022’s Amor Hardcore arrives next month

news.title: Burna Boy Reveals Release Date for New Album, Shares New Song Featuring Travis Scott: Listen
news.summary: “TaTata” arrives ahead of July’s No Sign of Weakness
